subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary function of the Central Budget?
question_hi: सरकारी मतों में क्या मुख्य कार्य है?
explanation_en:
The Central Budget primarily focuses on investments and capital market related activities.
In the context of India, the Central Budget is mainly concerned with allocating resources for development projects, promoting economic growth, and regulating the capital market.
Public Works, Education, and Health are the responsibilities of state governments in India.
explanation_hi: राज्य नेतृत्व को इनमें संवाद के कार्यानुभवती संवाद और प्रदेश, शिक्षा और स्वास्थिती के संवाद को समझें।
explanation_en: Understand the role of State Budget and its importance.
explanation_hi: राज्य बेटींग का भाग और उनके विभाग की मतलकी।
